title: Cant be invited to a game
body: My Friend says that some time when he sends me invites that he just gets a message thats states that i am ineligible to join his games. We arent playing ranked or anything so i dont see why this happens with just me. My friends say its just me that they cant invite or they send an invite but i never receive it.

replies.body: That's strange, it looks like you have a big enough champion pool so I'm not sure why that error might be occurring.  What happens if you try to hose the game?  Give your clients a restart in-case something lost sync, and let me know if it's still an issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=x4IMeGog,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-13T18:39:58.520+0000)
>
> That's strange, it looks like you have a big enough champion pool so I'm not sure why that error might be occurring.  What happens if you try to hose the game?  Give your clients a restart in-case something lost sync, and let me know if it's still an issue.

This is a reoccurring problem ever since i re installed the game a month ago. I can host game fine. And relogging in the game serves as a temporary fix.

It almost sounds like there might be a firewall setting getting in the way.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-config your firewall settings to see if that helps.

If not, grab the logs provided by that tool and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team should be able to help you directly with this.
